title: [Caffe2] Question about allreduce among multi workers.
body_html:
I notice that there're several allreduce algorithms in gloo, such as ring, halving_doubling and bcube.

How does Caffe2 call these functions to do gradient aggregation among multi workers?

Just call one of them?

Is this (in allreduce_ops.h) the place to choose which algorithm to use?
